prayers.name: Arise, O Lord...
prayers.text: Arise, O Lord, and let Thy enemies be scattered, and let all who hate Thee flee before Thy Face!

prayers.name: Arise, O Lord...
prayers.text: Surge Domine et dissipentur inimici Tui et fugiant qui oderunt Te a Facie Tua.

prayers.name: O God, our Protector...
prayers.text: O God, our Protector, look down upon us and cast Thine eyes upon the Face of Thy Christ!

prayers.name: O God, our Protector...
prayers.text: Protector noster, aspice, Deus, et respice in Faciem Christi Tui.

prayers.name: Golden Arrow
prayers.text:
May the most Holy, most Sacred, most Adorable, most Incomprehensible and Ineffable Name of God be always praised, blessed, loved, adored and glorified, in heaven, on earth and under the earth, by all the creatures of God, and by the Sacred Heart of Our Lord Jesus Christ, in the most Holy Sacrament of the altar.

Amen.

prayers.name: Golden Arrow
prayers.text:
Sanctissimum, sacratissimum, adorabile, incomprehensibile et ineffabile Nomen Dei semper laudetur, benedicatur, ametur, adoretur et glorificetur in caelo, in terra et sub terra, ab omnibus creaturis Dei, et a Sacro Corde Domini nostri Jesu Christi in Sanctissimo Sacramento Altaris.

Amen.
